    • Method Detail

      • join

        public boolean join(java.lang.String channel)
        Joins the given channel. If we are already in a channel, it will leave it.
        Parameters:
        channel - The channel to join
        Returns:
        true if successful; otherwise false

      • joinLastChannel

        public boolean joinLastChannel()
        Joins the given channel. If we are already in a channel, it will leave it.
        Returns:
